participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, often lost in her own thoughts.
participant_1.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: Walter
participant_2.personality: Vibrant and nostalgic, with a zest for life despite his age.
participant_2.background: i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i feel like i might live forever. i'm very strong for my age.
